SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[BlacklistEmail] ( [BlacklistEmail_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [BlacklistEmail_Regola] varchar(100) NULL , [BlacklistEmail_UserInsert] int NULL , [BlacklistEmail_UserUpdate] int NULL , [BlacklistEmail_UserDelete] int NULL , [BlacklistEmail_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [BlacklistEmail_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [BlacklistEmail_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[BlacklistEmail] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_BlacklistEmail PRIMARY KEY ([BlacklistEmail_Ky])
